title: Obscuring Haze
story: The pervasive mist blurs the lines between reality and illusion, making the castle a labyrinth of shadows. Yet, within its disorienting embrace, the vampires' movements seem eerily predictable.
effect: During this Day phase, all heroes gain +1 to their D6 combat rolls when attacking any Vampire Sister. However, the pervasive mist takes its toll: each time a hero declares a combat action against a Vampire Sister, they must immediately lose 1 Sanity.
